devdoc.details: Like the AddressDictator, but specifically for the Proxy__OVM_L1StandardBridge. We're      working on a generalized version of this but this is good enough for the moment.
devdoc.title: ChugSplashDictator

returnOwnership().notice: Transfers ownership of this contract to the finalOwner. Only callable by the finalOwner, which is intended to be our multisig. This function shouldn't be necessary, but it gives a sense of reassurance that we can recover if something really surprising goes wrong.
